name: Space Explosion (AR)
description:
🌌 A simple simulation AR app

🌌 Look around and shoot down some space ships

🌌 Needs camera permisson to use AR ( If AR doesn't work after you have given permission quit, re-open the app and look around.)

🌌 Works on Android  7 and newer with  AR support.

Resources: (3D model) Herminio Nieves (Audio) Space Race by tubebackr | https://soundcloud.com/tubebackr
